pullRequest.title: KOGITO-2757 Application.java: Refactor Codegen
pullRequest.bodyText:
Simplify Application.java (and related components) and use a templated approach wherever possible.
Currently:


Refactored Config classes


Refactored Application classes so that they use templates (very tiny templates)


Processes.java: is injectable when in a DI context, otherwise acts as a factory (as usual). The injectable ApplicationProcesses.java is no longer present (it is not required anymore).


RuleUnits section N/A


DecisionModels section N/A


PredictionModels section N/A


I will maybe add RuleUnits section: with the dual Factory+Injectable version approach, but I won't do Decisions and Predictions in this same PR otherwise it gets too big; and there is also ongoing work in parallel that I don't want to break.

nodes.bodyText: What about document this feature in the README somewhere else?
Can you please create a ticket for that?
Is there any reason why TemplatedGenerator is used as class to extend in many cases and as delegate in others?
To be removed? This override has been removed from DecisionContainerGenerator so I expect it can be removed here too
Can you please create a ticket to verify this?

commit.message: remove old methods, and deprecated tests

nodes.bodyText: What does fae mean? Something like Found AssignExpr? Maybe the name could be more descriptive.
Maybe this TemplatedGenerator could also be extracted into its own type as with ConfigBeanGenerator? As those resource files URLs are not needed in this class, just in the TemplatedGenerator itself.

This implies that first we have to call compilationUnit(). Wouldn't it be better for selectResource() to have the return value and call it also here and in compilationUnit every time? It would be less stateless...
Same here, maybe a separate type as with ConfigBeanGenerator would be cleaner?
Maybe a check that only one Processes bean is present wouldn't be bad, or?
In case it is still disabled, a JIRA would be beneficial here.
